name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Fullstack Engineer with over 13 years of experience in delivering high-performance applications, specializing in **Java**, **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **Angular**. Expert in both frontend and backend development, with a robust skillset in **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and cloud solutions. Proven track record of implementing microservices architecture and leading architecture reviews to ensure scalable and maintainable designs. 
Skilled in database management with **Oracle**, **SQL**, and **PL/SQL**, and proficient in performance testing using **JMeter**. Demonstrated ability to produce high-quality software through meticulous software design processes and a solid understanding of networking concepts. Additionally, experienced in developing AI/ML-driven applications, with hands-on expertise in deploying solutions on AWS and Azure.
